subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Having become an afterthought in the Yankees’ bullpen, Joba Chamberlain agreed to a one-year, $2.5 million deal with Detroit, a person close to him said.
snippet: Having become an afterthought in the Yankees’ bullpen, Joba Chamberlain agreed to a one-year, $2.5 million deal with Detroit, a person close to him said.
